name: Taskmaster
text: You intimidate weaker allies into reckless ferocity.
benefit: As a standard action, you spur an ally, who must have fewer Hit Dice than yourself, to reckless effort. For 1 minute, the ally gains a +1 morale bonus on attack rolls, weapon damage rolls, and Will saves against mind-affecting effects. However, the ally also takes a –2 penalty to AC and on skill checks. To affect an unwilling ally, you must succeed at an Intimidate check with the same DC used to demoralize your ally.
special: If you have 10 or more ranks in Intimidate, the morale bonus increases to +2.
staminaText: When using this feat, you can spend 5 stamina points to affect a creature with up to 5 more Hit Dice than you possess.
text_zh: 你的威吓将软弱的盟友变为暴徒。
prerequisites_zh: 挫志鞭笞，威吓5级，大地精。
benefit_zh: 你能以一个标准动作鞭策一名HD低于你自身的盟友，使他不顾一切地战斗。在1分钟内，该盟友攻击检定、伤害检定以及对抗影响心灵效果的意志豁免上获得+1士气加值。然而这名盟友也会在AC以及技能检定上受到-2减值。如果你要影响一名非自愿的盟友，你必须对其成功进行一次DC等同于挫败士气的威吓检定。
special_zh: 如果你有10或更高等级的威吓技能，士气加值提升至+2。
staminaText_zh: 当你使用这个专长时，你可以消耗5点耐力来让自己能够影响一个不超过自己5个HD的生物。
